a.style: font-family:"Playfair Display", Georgia, "Times New Roman", serif

text.tspan: Annual change in GDP, population and CO₂ emissions, World
Annual percentage change in total gross domestic product (GDP), population, and annual carbon dioxide (CO₂)
Source: Data compiled from multiple sources by World Bank, Our World in Data based on the Global Carbon Project
Note: GDP is measured in constant 2010 dollars, and therefore adjusts for inflation.
